Framework agnostic static utility functions.

Functions

is_in_place_method(attr) Determines if the method is in-place (ie modifies the self)
map_dict(hook, kwargs, func)

pass_func_args(func) Wrapper gathering partial object from function call.
pass_method_args(method) Wrapper gathering partialmethod object from method call.

Classes

PythonEncoder([retrieve_tensorvar]) Encode python and torch objects to be JSON-able In particular, (hooked) Torch objects are replaced by their id.
PythonJSONDecoder(worker, *args, **kwargs) Decode JSON and reinsert python types when needed
